entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 10:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
